resources.string: When this service is enabled it lets Dot safe app to display notifications and indicators every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone on any screen.
Get notified every time a third-party app uses camera or microphone
Puts Your privacy on the Top
You will get a short vibration whenever an application or a service uses microphone or camera
Align the dots in the way you want and you are comfortable with
This app is currently in development stage so feel free to report bugs and your suggestions to improve app. Thanks for understanding ! :)

This app asks for accessibility permission to check if any app is using your camera/ mic. We do NOT collect any kinds of information from your device. All the logs are stored on your device. Still Unsure ? You can get the premium version :)
Made for you by Aravind Chowdary
This will clear all the logs which cannot be recovered back. \nStill want to proceed ?
The app will send non-personal detail about your app usage to help us make this app even more productive overtime. This also helps us understand bugs before more people experience them.
